content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (0, 0) and (2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position (0, 0)) with inventory: {'iron-plate': 81} and fuel: {'coal': 9}
- Furnace (position (2, 0)) with inventory: {'copper-plate': 73} and fuel: {'coal': 9}

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position not specified) that crafts copper cables using copper plates.

### Electronic circuit factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position not specified) that crafts electronic circuits using copper cables and iron plates.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to missing ingredients
- Ensure that all required ingredients are available in your inventory or accessible from nearby storage before attempting to craft items.

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to extract items from the correct furnace and ensure that the furnace has items available for extraction.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
